column5: Hey guys check out these amazing shark pictures! @ http://www.factsoffishing.com/news.php?id=127  Don't know why but they just make me smile lol!  Dave Mercer

That's Hilarious.  By the way, great liitle bit on CH morning news this week. My wife called me into the room and said " You gotta come watch this crazy fishing guy" I knew before I had even seen the TV that it had to be you.  Good Job.   Clarence

LOL, I think the one with the tongue out could be me? As I am always like that.  Thanks for the laugh.  Sadly I do not get to watch your show anymore   No TV at home for now.  Have to rely on the interweb to get a dose of Dave.
Stuck on that salt water stuff are ya? Your gonna have to give up them Green carp.....

Hey Cranks Baits we may have some good news for you soon. We are working on some cool stuff for our you tube channel that will allow you to see a bunch more of our stuff. If you get a chance subscribe to it @ http://www.youtube.com/user/factsoffishing  Tell all your friends about it the more people we get to subscribe the easier it will be for us to get it done. So come on OFC'ers I don't often ask too much but please all sign up for our free you tube channel I think you will really like what you see in the next few weeks there. The more the better subscribe at http://www.youtube.com/user/factsoffishing  Dave Mercer
Thats freekin' hilarious Mr. Mercer  my wife is still laughing.
Just signed up Dave. I just watch your shark video. Was that Bay of Fundy NB.?
I'm in too... just going it to have a look around...  Tiz
They have your smile Dave lol
Thats hilarious Dave, looks like a Disney Shark ..... are those really your teeth ?
